name: Zeitview
headline: Inspection software for renewable energy & sustainable infrastructure
description: At Zeitview, our goal is to accelerate the transition to renewable energy and sustainable infrastructure. We do this by combining advanced inspection software with the ability to capture visual data in more than 60 countries. This allows us to deliver safer, faster, lower-cost inspections of energy and infrastructure assets with a high degree of accuracy and repeatability. We use artificial intelligence and machine learning to ingest and analyze vast amounts of visual data to provide objective insights that our customers can act on immediately.

founders.name: Dan Burton, Founder
founders.description: Zeitview Founder/CEO; US Marine Corps Infantry; Goldman Sachs; US Senate Staff

generated_description:
Zeitview is a cutting-edge inspection software company based in Santa Monica, California, that was founded in 2014. It is part of the esteemed Y Combinator Batch W15 and has a robust team of 200 employees. Zeitview's mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to accelerate the global transition to renewable energy and sustainable infrastructure. They achieve this through advanced inspection solutions that leverage artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML), helping capture and analyze visual data across more than 60 countries.

Their core offering revolves around enhanced inspection processes for energy and infrastructure assets. By utilizing AI and extensive visual data gathering, Zeitview delivers inspections that are safer, faster, and more cost-effective, all while ensuring a high degree of accuracy and repeatability. The company's solutions touch on multiple sectors, including solar, wind, commercial real estate, construction, and utilities, making them a versatile partner for businesses managing various asset classifications.

The technology they employ, known as Zeitview Insights, helps clients make informed, near real-time decisions about their crucial assets. Services include specialized insights for solar and wind assets, property management, and maintenance planning—all aimed at reducing operational costs and enhancing asset performance.

Zeitview is tagged under various categories such as artificial intelligence, drones, B2B, climate, and renewable energy, showcasing its commitment to environmental sustainability. With its innovative approach and comprehensive solutions, Zeitview is setting the stage for a more efficient and green future in asset management and infrastructure inspection.

You can learn more about their offerings and initiatives on their website: [Zeitview](https://www.zeitview.com/).
